title: Full Show (Bears blow out Pats on MNF, LeBron is 0-3, Brady on slow start)
description:
00:00 Bears blow out Patriots 33-14
22:48 LeBron and Lakers fall to 0-3
54:30 Ben Simmons fouls out for 2nd time in 3 games
1:08:31 Brady responds to 3-4 start for the Bucs
1:21:36 Jerry Jones says he wants to see Dak get outside the pocket more
1:36:00 Lakers reportedly to resume trade talks with Jazz
1:44:25 Who is missing the other more? Brady or Belichick?
1:50:51 NFL determines that referees were not seeking Mike Evans’ autograph
1:55:18 Colts to bench Matt Ryan for the rest of the season
